modName: HD Texture - Flame Atronach Armor Swap
descriptionHtml:
FORGOT TO MENTION:
I WILL BE ATTEMPTING TO RETEXTURE THE FLAMES OF THE FLAME ATRONACH TO COMPLIMENT THE ARMOR, BUT so far I can\'t seem to find it. I think it uses the generic flames as a texture, but if someone could confirm it, that would be greatly appreciated.


CrEaTeD....... By The One And Only And Most Powerful Minority Modder Of All Time.......... In This World From-
Fine.
Created By Saber Chewy (aka: SaberChewy)(<---- In case you\'re IQ is too low to figure that out).
Please don\'t discredit me, or I\'ll murder a cute, fuzzy kitten while it\'s trying to attack a cluster of the scariest apples you\'ve ever seen. ( watch?v=8-1F-CokXNU )

Description:
The lands of Skyrim holds the coldest of winters of all Tamriel and within the depth\'s of such frigid lands are the environment defying miracle floating fire thingies with unfitting armor for said environment... Seriously, ever wonder what REALLY happens to steel when constantly heated... IN THE BLIZZARD RIDDEN MOUNTAINS?
Since the never-ending barrage of snow won\'t put those damn flying fire thingies out, I decided to make a simple texture replacer to make the flaming fire thingy of flames at least LOOK the part of being in the frigid highlands.
And I don\'t care if this is already out. If it is, and if you\'re gonna make a big deal about it, just shut (your fingers) up right now and go download the other one, since it\'s SOOOOOOOOO much more badass than mine.
-=-=-

-=-=-
I\'M TOO LAZY TO MAKE A NEXUS MOD MANAGER THINGY THINGY APPLE THINGY SO YOU MUST DO THIS MANUALLY, MUWAHAHAHAHAHA! YOUR WORST FEAR.... EFFORT! MUWAHAHAHA!
-=-=-
How To Install:
Drag contents of MY data folder ---> Into ---> YOUR data folder. Then Click YES to everything.
-=-=-

This File Contains The Following:
	SUPER TEXTURES
	Snowy Embers -OR- Ashen Embers variation of the Flame Atronach\'s Armor Swap.
	More encouragement for extra low self esteem.
